plot: Luo Ming quits her job as an accountant and despite her husband's objections opens a bar in South China and counsels married couples.
title: 'Meng' jiu jia zhi ye
plot_es: Luo Ming quits her job as an accountant and despite her husband's objections opens a bar in South China and counsels married couples.
plot_en: Luo Ming quits her job as an accountant and despite her husband's objections opens a bar in South China and counsels married couples.
